pure interface of class zeta.format.impl.FormatBeside

The documentated page. 
public class FormatBeside
  extends CompoundFormat
{
    public FormatBeside(int indentation,
                        Format[] formats);
    public FormatBeside(Format[] formats);
    public FormatBeside(int indent,
                        Format f1,
                        Format f2);
    public FormatBeside(int indent,
                        Format f1,
                        Format f2,
                        Format f3);
    public FormatBeside(int indent,
                        Format f1,
                        Format f2,
                        Format f3,
                        Format f4);
    public FormatBeside(Format f1,
                        Format f2);
    public FormatBeside(Format f1,
                        Format f2,
                        Format f3);
    public FormatBeside(Format f1,
                        Format f2,
                        Format f3,
                        Format f4);
    public FormatBeside(int indent,
                        Format f1,
                        Format f2,
                        Format f3,
                        Format f4,
                        Format f5);
    public FormatBeside(Format f1,
                        Format f2,
                        Format f3,
                        Format f4,
                        Format f5);
    public FormatBeside(int indent,
                        Format f1,
                        Format f2,
                        Format f3,
                        Format f4,
                        Format f5,
                        Format f6);
    public FormatBeside(Format f1,
                        Format f2,
                        Format f3,
                        Format f4,
                        Format f5,
                        Format f6);
    protected int computeMaxWidth();
    protected int computeMaxLastWidth();
    protected int computeMinHeight();
    public TextRectangle printTextBeside(int indentation,
                                         FormatStream stream,
                                         int width,
                                         int lastWidth);
}
